maqras.text: 51|31|(pinnar iprahim vanavarkalai nokki) ‘‘tutarkale! Unkal kariyamenna? (Etarkaka ninkal inku vantirkal?)'' Enru kettar
51|32|atarkavarkal ‘‘niccayamaka nankal (perum) kurravalikalana (lut napiyin) makkalitam anuppappattullom'' enru kurinar
51|33|‘‘nankal, avarkal mitu kali mannal ceyta (cutta) karkalai erivatarkaka (anuppappattullom)
51|34|‘‘(avai) umatu iraivanitam varampu miriyavarkalukkena (peyarkal elutappattu) ataiyalamitappattavaiyakum
51|35|Akave, (avarkal alivatarku munnatakave avvuril irunta) nampikkai kontavarkalai atiliruntu nam velippatutti vittom
51|36|eninum, atil (luttutaiya) oru vittarait tavira, nampikkai konta oruvaraiyum nankal kanavillai
51|37|tunpuruttum vetanaiyai payappatukiravarkalukku atil oru patippinaiyai vittu vaittom
51|38|musavutaiya (carittirat)tilum (oru patippinai) irukkiratu. Telivana attatcikalutan avarai hpir'avnitam nam anuppiya camayattil
51|39|avan valuvana tan atciyin karvattal avaraip purakkanittu, ‘‘ivaroru cuniyakkarar; allatu paittiyakkarar'' enru kurinan
51|40|atalal, avanaiyum avanutaiya pataikalaiyum nam pitittuk katalil erintuvittom. Avan enrenrume nintanaikkullaki vittan
51|41|‘atu' ennum makkalilum (oru patippinaiyuntu). Avarkal mitu nam (nacakaramana) malattuk karrai anuppiya camayattil
51|42|atu pattataiyellam tuciya(kkip parakkati)kkamal vitavillai
51|43|‘samutu' ennum makkalilum (oru patippinaiyuntu). ‘‘Ninkal oru kalam varai cukamaka valntirunkal'' enru avarkalukkuk kurappattatarku
51|44|avarkal tankal iraivanin kattalaiyai mirinarkal. Akave, avarkal (tankalai alikka vanta mekattaip) parttuk kontirukkum polute avarkalai or iti mulakkam pitittuk kontatu
51|45|akave, avarkal nirkavum mutiyavillai. (Utkaravum mutiyavillai;) nam'mitam palivankavum mutiyavillai. (Iruntavare alintu vittanar)
51|46|itarku munnar (irunta) nuhutaiya makkalaiyum (alittu vittom). Niccayamaka avarkalum pavam ceyyum makkalakave iruntanar
51|47|(Evarutaiya utaviyuminri) nam caktiyaik konte vanattai amaittom. Niccayamaka nam (atai avarkalin arivirkellam ettatavaru) mikka vicalamakkiyum vaittirukkirom
51|48|pumiyai nam (vicalamaka) virittom. Virippavarkalilellam mikka melana vitattil virippavar name
51|49|ovvoru vastukkalaiyum (an, pen konta) joti jotiyakave nam pataittirukkirom. (Itaikkontu) ninkal nallunarcci peruvirkalaka
51|50|akave, (pavattiliruntu vilaki) allahvin pakkam veku tiviramaka ninkal viraintu cellunkal. Niccayamaka nan avanaip parri unkalukkup pakirankamakave accamutti eccarikkai ceykiren
51|51|allahvutan vanakkattirkuriya veroru iraivanai akkatirkal. Niccayamaka nan, avanitamiruntu unkalukku (itaip parriyum) pakirankamaka accamutti eccarikkai ceypavaraka irukkiren
51|52|ivvare ivarkalukku munniruntavarkalum, avarkalitam entat tutar vantapotilum, avarai cuniyakkarar allatu paittiyakkarar enru kuramalirukkavillai

51|53|(ivvaru kurumpatiye) avarkal tankalukkul (paramparai paramparaiyaka) oruvarukkoruvar upatecam ceytu vantanar polum! Illai, avarkal (iyarkaiyileye ivvaru kurak kutiya) aniyayakkara makkalaka iruntanar
51|54|(napiye!) Nir avarkalaip purakkanittu vituviraka. (Avarkal nirakarippataip parri) nir nintikkappata mattir
51|55|(napiye!) Nir nallupatecam ceyviraka. Niccayamaka nallupatecam nampikkaiyalarkalukkup payanalikkum
51|56|jinkalaiyum, manitarkalaiyum (avarkal ennai arintu) ennai vanankuvatarke tavira (veretarkakavum) nan pataikkavillai
51|57|Avarkalitattil nan oru porulaiyum ketkavillai. Avarkal enakku unavu kotuttuk kontirukkumarum nan koravillai. (Akave)
51|58|(napiye! Nir kuruviraka:) Niccayamaka allahtan anaivarukkum unavalippavanum, acaikka mutiyata palacaliyumavan

51|59|ivvakkiramakkararkalin nanparkalukku irunta (nanmai, timaiyai alakkakkutiya) alavup patikalaip polave, niccayamaka ivarkalukkum alavup patikaluntu. (Avai niraintatum vetanaiyaik kontu ivarkalaip pitittuk kolvom.) Atalal, avarkal avacarappata ventam
51|60|(vicaranaikkaka pavikalukku) vakkalikkappatta nalil innirakarippavarkalukkuk ketutan
52|1|tur (ennum) malaiyin mitu cattiyamaka
52|2|viritta ettil vari variyaka elutappatta veta nulin mitu cattiyamaka
52|3|viritta ettil vari variyaka elutappatta veta nulin mitu cattiyamaka
52|4|paittul mahmur (ennum alayattin) mitu cattiyamaka
52|5|uyarnta mukattin mitu cattiyamaka
52|6|(totarntu) alaikal motik kontirukkum camuttirattin mitu cattiyamaka
52|7|(napiye!) Niccayamaka umatu iraivanin vetanai (avarkalukku) vante tirum
52|8|evaralum atait tatukka mutiyatu
52|9|vanamum tutitutittuk kumurum nalil
52|10|malaikal (peyarntu) parantotum (nalil)
52|11|(napiye! Um'maip) poyyakkum ivarkalukku annalil ketutan
52|12|avarkal (vin vitantavatattil) mulki vilaiyatikkontu irukkinranar
52|13|avarkal narakattin pakkam (atittu) verutti ottappatum nalil
52|14|(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal poyyakkik kontirunta naraka neruppu itutan'' enru kurappatum
52|15|itu verum cuniyamtana? Allatu, itai ninkal (unkal kannal) parkkavillaiya

52|16|Atil nulaintu vitunkal. (Atan vetanaiyaip poruttuc) cakittuk kontirunkal; allatu cakikkatirunkal. (Irantum) unkalukkuc camame! (Vetanaiyil or anuvalavum kuraiyatu.) Ninkal ceytavarrukkuriya kulitan unkalukkuk kotukkappatum
52|17|allahvukkup payantu natantavarkal niccayamaka corkkankalilum inpattilum irupparkal
52|18|tankal iraivan tankalukku alittiruppavarraip parriyum, naraka vetanaiyiliruntu tankalait tankal iraivan patukattuk kontataip parriyum makilcci ataintavarkalaka irupparkal
52|19|(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal ceyta nanmaikalin karanamaka (itil ullavarrai) mikka taralamakap pucittuk kontum, parukik kontum irunkal'' (enrum kurappatum)
52|20|varicaiyakap potappatta kattilkalin mitu cayn(tu patut)tavarkalaka iruppar. Nam avarkalukku (‘hurulin' ennum) kannalakika(lakiya kanni)kalai tirumanam ceytu vaippom

52|21|enta nampikkaiyalarkalin cantatikal, tankal perrorkalaip pinparri nampikkai kolkirarkalo (antac cantatikalin nanmaikal kuraivaka iruntum avarkalin perrorkal tiruptiyataiyum poruttu) avarkalutaiya cantatikalaiyum avarkalutan (corkkattil) certtuvituvom. Itanal avarkalutaiya perrorkalin nanmaikalil etaiyum nam kuraittuvita mattom. Ovvoru manitanum, tan ceyta ceyalukkup pinaiyaka irukkiran
52|22|avarkal virumpiya (parpala vakai) kanivarkkankalaiyum, mamicankalaiyum avarkalukku (naltorum) nam (eralamakak) kotuttu varuvom
52|23|oruvarutaiya kinnattai marroruvar (kalippal) pitunkik kolvar. (Atanal) manattankalo allatu mariyataikkuraivo erpatatu
